𒎎 𒉌𒌓 lí.utᵘ lithᵒ 𒇷 LIᵗʰ 𓊌 stone

𒎎 𒉌𒌓 za₂ 𒍝 za "bead, gem" 𒎎 NA NA4 na₄ NI.UD 𒉌 𒌓 •litho 𒎎 𒌓𒉌 čito-NE Šatti-NE “stone” 𒎎 ZA.NA in 𒍝𒉌𒌓 za₂ "gem" ≈ gyne 𒎎 𒌓𒉌 𒉌𒌓 PIʳNI PIᵗNIʳ petraᵒⁿ পাথৰ pathor piedra batú peraᵒⁿ "stone" ପଥର pôthôrô <> pot potter 𒎎 𒌓 𒉌 ᵖutu.na₄ photon bight.na₄ ᵇutu.na₄ 𒎎𒈾 •buţana₄ 𒄑𒃶𒈾 bukānu בוכנה būḵānā "pestle" 𒎎 𒌓𒉌 bir.nit "burned" ebni 𐤀𐤁𐤍 ʾbn > אֶבֶן éven® 𓇋 𓈖 𓂋 𓊌 vνnir "stone" 𒎎 𒌓𒉌 ☼ gün ≈ khẽnẽ 𒎎 𒌓𒉌 𓇶 rocaᵒⁿ rock rumi 𒎎 NA NA4 na₄ natron NI.UD 𒉌 𒌓𒈾 salts…@naut 𒉭 unze ZT+NI 𒌓𒉌 Steine
𒎎 NI+IT -nit granit (memetic only)
𒎎 NI+T nitᵒˢ => λίθος líthos lith (stone) sic or sound change
𒎎 N.D ≈ hand in 𒎎 𒄯 hand-mill 𒎎 TAG ≈ тас tas 𒎎 泥土 nítǔ (soil)
𒎎 ნიადაგი niadagi (soil)
𒎎 NA ᏅᏳ nvyu

𒎎 ≈ 𒉌𒂵 in 𒎎𒀠𒉌𒂵 na₄ al-li₂ga alliga al'litho stone

𒎎 ≈ 𒍝𒉌𒌓 za₂na ≈ 𒍝𒄠 za-am gem?

𒎎 na₄ •la •litho in 𒎎𒍝𒆳𒀀 la-za-kur-duru₅ ლაჟვარდი lažvardi …duru वैडूर्य vaiḍūrya lapis 𒎎 NI.PIʳ napir NI.PIˢ •napis > lapis 𒎎𒍝𒆳 za-gin₃ "lapis" 𒎎𒍝𒆳𒀀 na4 za-gin₃duru5 zaginduru "lapis" (sic!) 𒀀 ≈ 𓃀 𓂧 𓈒 𓏥 bad bath petra 𒎎𒍝𒆳𒄑𒀸 na4 za-gin₃ĝeš-dili zaginĝešdili "string of lapis lazuli beads"

𒎎 •batú ≈ buka in 𒎎𒈾 •buţana₄ 𒄑𒃶𒈾 bukānu בוכנה būḵānā "pestle"

𒎎 maen mein "stone"

𒎎 maen 𒇽𒅎𒎎𒈾 IM.maen.na मुनीम munīm :

𒇽𒅎𒎎𒈾 lu₂im-na4na accountant lu'imnak मुनीम munīm مُنِيب munībᵒⁿ

𒉌 vνn •we.nous 𓈖 •VENI in 𒉌𒀉𒉌 "vending" < buni ≈ 𒎎 ebni

𒎎 NA •litho ≈ •light ≠ 𓇯 night

𓊌 𒎎 stænihte stony ≠ 𓇯 night

𒎎𒀠𒉌𒂵 na4 al-li2-ga "stone" a'lith?
𒎎𒀀𒁄𒂊 na4 a-bal-e "a stone"

𒎎𒀭𒅗𒄢𒈨 na4 an-zu2-gul-me "type of stone"

𒈾𒋗 na-šu
𒈾𒋗 bearer, carry, shift, to lift, to rock

𒉌𒌓𒎌 𒉌𒋝𒋾
